songs.lyrics:
Cotton Candy Skies
Why can't you be mine
Always on my Mind
I’m Running out of time
Skies aren't Always blue when i think of you
Trying make it through i cut you like the flu
With my Outstreched Hands
Wish i had a Chance
Life just not to fair
I'm stuck in this chair

You are like the moon
I’m chasing after you
Are you just a phase
I pray its not this way

[Cotton Candy Skies
Why can't you be mine
Always on my mind
I'm running out of time
Skies aren't always blue
When i think of you
Tryna make it through cut you like the flu]x2

Told you how i feel
Were you even real
Miss you so damn much
I'm thanking all my luck

Breathing it in now
Why can't i see straight
My mind switching lanes
I'm trapped in my own brain
songs.title: C A N D Y
